archimate:Capability.name: People Management
archimate:Capability.documentation:
This capability involves embedding information security into every stage of the employment lifecycle, from induction through to termination. This includes integrating security considerations into employment contracts, ongoing management, and termination procedures. It assigns ownership of information to capable individuals, ensuring they understand and accept their responsibility for its protection. The capability also enables individuals working in remote environments or using their own devices to safeguard critical and sensitive information against loss, theft, and cyber attacks.
Furthermore, it entails maintaining a comprehensive, ongoing Security Education, Training, and Awareness (SETA) program. This program is designed to promote and instill expected security behaviors in all individuals who access the organization's information and systems, thereby reinforcing the organization's commitment to robust information security practices.
